user_stories.title: Browse Products
user_stories.description: I want to browse through categories of products so that I can find items I might be interested in.
development_plan: Design and implement category navigation
Create product listing pages
Implement filtering and sorting options

user_stories.title: Search Functionality
user_stories.description: I want to use a search bar to find specific products by typing keywords so that I can quickly find what I'm looking for.
development_plan: Implement search bar component
Integrate search functionality with product database
Optimize search algorithm for speed and accuracy

user_stories.title: View Product Details
user_stories.description: I want to click on products to view detailed information such as price, descriptions, specifications, and customer reviews so that I can make informed decisions.
development_plan: Design and implement product detail page layout
Retrieve and display product information from database
Integrate customer review system

user_stories.title: Create an Account
user_stories.description: I want to create an account using my email or social media profiles so that I can save my preferences and order history.
development_plan: Design and implement user registration form
Implement email and social media authentication
Create user profile database schema

user_stories.title: Password Recovery
user_stories.description: I want to recover my forgotten password through my email so that I can regain access to my account.
development_plan: Design and implement password recovery form
Integrate email notification system
Implement password reset functionality

user_stories.title: Add to Cart
user_stories.description: I want to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items in a single transaction.
development_plan: Design and implement cart icon and functionality
Create cart management system
Integrate cart with checkout process

user_stories.title: Checkout Process
user_stories.description: I want to easily proceed to checkout, enter my shipping and payment information, and confirm my order so that I can complete my purchase.
development_plan: Design and implement checkout page layout
Create shipping and payment form components
Integrate order confirmation system

user_stories.title: Order Tracking
user_stories.description: I want to track my order status after I have made a purchase so that I know when to expect delivery.
development_plan: Design and implement order tracking page
Integrate order status updates from shipping carriers
Create notification system for order updates

user_stories.title: Leave Reviews
user_stories.description: I want to leave reviews for products I have purchased so that I can share my experience with other shoppers.
development_plan: Design and implement review submission form
Create review database schema
Integrate review display on product detail pages

user_stories.title: Receive Recommendations
user_stories.description: I want to receive personalized product recommendations based on my browsing and purchase history
development_plan: Design and implement recommendation engine
Integrate recommendation system with user profiles
Display recommendations on relevant pages

insights.title: User Story Dependency
insights.description: User Story 4 (Create an Account) is dependent on User Story 5 (Password Recovery) because implementing password recovery requires an existing account creation framework.

insights.title: External Project Impact
insights.description: User Story 7 (Checkout Process) might be affected by Project THANOS, an internal code name for a new payment gateway integration project, altering how payment information is processed.

insights.title: Scope Modification
insights.description: User Story 5 (Password Recovery) requires the addition of four new classes for security measures, which were initially out of scope but now deemed necessary for enhanced security protocols.

insights.title: Cross-functional Requirement
insights.description: User Story 3 (View Product Details) and User Story 9 (Leave Reviews) are closely linked, as displaying reviews on product detail pages enhances informed decision-making for customers.

insights.title: Performance Consideration
insights.description: User Story 2 (Search Functionality) must be optimized for speed and accuracy, as it significantly impacts user satisfaction and engagement with the application.

insights.title: User Experience Enhancement
insights.description: User Story 10 (Receive Recommendations) and User Story 12 (Save for Later) can be combined to enhance user experience by using saved items as part of the data to generate personalized recommendations.

insights.title: Data Privacy Concerns
insights.description: User Story 4 (Create an Account) and User Story 13 (Edit Profile Information) must adhere to global data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA), affecting how user data is stored and managed.

insights.title: Third-party Integration
insights.description: User Story 11 (Apply Discount Codes) might require integration with third-party coupon and discount code providers, introducing dependencies on external APIs.

insights.title: Customer Support Scalability
insights.description: User Story 14 (Contact Support) highlights the need for a scalable customer support system, potentially integrating AI chatbots to handle common queries before escalating to human support.

insights.title: Technical Debt Consideration
insights.description: Implementing User Story 15 (Return and Refund Process) might introduce technical debt if not aligned with the current order management system, necessitating future refactorings to ensure system integrity.
